body_html:
I am having the same issue, however as far as I can tell it only shows up when I am using conv3d (conv2d works fine), after one epoch.

OS: Ubuntu 16.04
CUDA: 7.5
CUDNN: Tried 4.0, 5.0 and 5.1 (and the corresponding tensorflow binaries)

Any thoughts? I really would like to get this sorted out as quickly as possible.

Thanks.
